title: T206 SL Brown Hindu Back - Need Some Expert Help.
author: bundy462

posts.post_title: T206 SL Brown Hindu Back - Need Some Expert Help.
posts.post_content: I'm seeing some sites that list two different brown Hindu backs for T206s.  One regular and one "Southern League Brown Hindu".  I've never seen a brown Hindu on a SLer where the back is actually different from the normal brown Hindu.  With the Old Mill, there is certainly a difference.  Am I missing something here or is the fact that it's just on the back of a SL front make it one of these?
Posted in wrong section, I apologize.  Can't figure out how to move it, someone help me out please.
The brown hindu back is the same on all cards...there are no variations...may have mistaken with old mill as u stated.

Thanks.  Nice Chase card by the way...

[quote name="ullmandds" post=973616]The brown hindu back is the same on all cards...there are no variations...may have mistaken with old mill as u stated.[/QUOTE]
i hope you are not using T206.org's "valuation" tool with Hindu's...That is unless you have one to sell :)
thank you...I no longer own it!

That's actually where I saw it.  I now realize that I am just an idiot interpreting the entry in the valuation tool as an actual different back for the Hindu.  Live and learn.

[quote name="mintacular" post=973872]i hope you are not using T206.org's "valuation" tool with Hindu's...That is unless you have one to sell :)[/QUOTE]
